EmailTemplate.description: Used for the Relocation Requirements Form for Chinese Language
EmailTemplate.name: Relocation Requirment Form: Send Form Details in Chinese
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Opportunity.Account} 移机报价 {!Opportunity.Manual_Quote_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Relocation_Requirements_Form__c.Contact__c}，您好！
为了给您提供准确的测序仪移机服务报价并确认运输需求（若有此需求），请您完整填写因美纳测序仪移机需求表({!Relocation_Requirements_Form__c.External_Site_Link__c})。输入此密码可进入填写页面 [{!Relocation_Requirements_Form__c.Pass_Key__c}]。
感谢您的及时回复！
